statements.name: PROC HADOOP
statements.description: Controls access to the Hadoop server.

statements.name: HDFS
statements.description: Submits Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) commands.

statements.name: MAPREDUCE
statements.description: Submits MapReduce programs into a Hadoop cluster.

statements.name: PIG
statements.description: Submits Pig language code into a Hadoop cluster.

statements.name: PROPERTIES
statements.description: Submits configuration properties to the Hadoop server.
